location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:95 x 70 mmCondition:The image is in good condition.Foliation:'b'; '36'Process:Silver gelatin print

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:View in Koweit [Kuwait]. One man stands at centre while to his left another sits on the step in front of a decorated archway. A third man stands in the right background against a whitewashed wall.All three men wear dark outer robes, keffiyehs and agals.Inscriptions:Lower left, below image, in pen: ‘Koweit.’Upper left, above image, in pencil, crossed-out: ‘b’Lower right, alongside image, in pencil: ‘38’Lower right, below image, in pen: ‘(Feb. 1918)’
